titles.title: You Are My All In All

properties.copyright: 1991 Shepherd's Heart Music, Inc., Administered by Word Music Group, Inc.
properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 e1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
E
You are my strength
When I am weak
You are the treasure
That I seek
You are my All in All
Seeking You as a precious jew'l
Lord to give up I'd be a fool
You are my All in All

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Brothers:
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name
Sisters:
You are my strength
When I am weak
You are the treasure
That I seek
You are my All in All

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Brothers:
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name
Sisters:
Seeking You as a precious jew'l
Lord to give up I'd be a fool
You are my All in All

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Brothers:
Taking my sin
My cross my shame
Rising again I bless Your name
You are my All in All
Sisters:
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Brothers:
When I fall down You pick me up
When I am dry You fill my cup
You are my All in All
Sisters:
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Brothers:
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name
Sisters:
Taking my sin
My cross my shame
Rising again I bless Your name
You are my All in All

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Brothers:
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name
Sisters:
When I fall down You pick me up
When I am dry You fill my cup
You are my All in All

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Together:
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name
